00021 #ifndef STRING_H_

00031 // for convenience
00032 #include "I18N.h"

00034 #include <cstdint>

00036 
00037 class QString;
00038 
00039 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00040 
00041 //#ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00042 //#define SYLPH_STRING_CLASS MutableString
00043 //class MutableString;
00044 //typedef const MutableString String;
00045 //#else
00046 #define SYLPH_STRING_CLASS String
00047 //#endif
00048 
00049 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00050 
00051 typedef std::uint16_t uchar;
00052 
00053 static Array<uchar> spacechars = {' ','\n','\r','\f','\t','\013'};
00054 
00055 class SYLPH_STRING_CLASS : public Hashable, 
00056         public BoolConvertible<SYLPH_STRING_CLASS> {
00057     friend bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00058     friend bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00059     friend String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00060     //friend String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00061     friend String operator&(const String lhs, const String(*rhs)(const String));
00062     friend String operator&(const String(*lhs)(String), const String rhs);
00063     friend String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);
00064     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const String rhs);
00065 
00066 public:
00067     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS();
00068     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const char * orig);
00069     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const Array<char> orig);
00070     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const Array<uchar> orig);
00071     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const std::string & orig);
00072     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const QString & orig);
00073     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const String & orig);
00074     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const char c);
00075     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const bool b);
00076     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const sint i);
00077     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const suint i);
00078     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const slong l);
00079     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const sulong l);
00080     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const float f);
00081     SYLPH_STRING_CLASS(const double d);
00082     virtual ~SYLPH_STRING_CLASS();
00083 
00084     std::size_t length() const;
00085     const uchar at(std::size_t idx) const;
00086     const char * ascii() const;
00087     const char * utf8() const;
00088     const Array<uchar> utf16() const;
00089 
00090     String toLowerCase() const;
00091     String toUpperCase() const;
00092     bool equalsIgnoreCase(const String other) const;
00093 
00094     bool endsWith(const String other) const;
00095     bool startsWith(const String other) const;
00096     bool contains(const String other) const;
00097 
00098     String trim() const;
00099     String substring(std::idx_t begin) const;
00100     String substring(std::idx_t begin, std::idx_t end) const;
00101 
00102     sidx_t indexOf(const String substr, idx_t start = 0) const;
00103     sidx_t lastIndexOf(const String substr) const;
00104     sidx_t lastIndexOf(const String substr, idx_t start) const;
00105 
00106     String copy() const;
00107     bool merge(String other) const;
00108     int hashCode() const;
00109 
00110     static String fromHex(int,bool up);
00111     static String fromOct(int, bool up);
00112     static String fromSci(float, bool up);
00113     static String fromSci(double, bool up);
00114 
00115     bool boolValue() const;
00116     sint intValue() const;
00117     suint uintValue() const;
00118     slong longValue() const;
00119     sulong ulongValue() const;
00120     float floatValue() const;
00121     double doubleValue() const;
00122 
00123     inline bool toBool() const {
00124         return *this != "";
00125     }
00126     
00127     const String& operator=(const char * orig) const;
00128     const String& operator=(const std::string & orig) const;
00129     const String& operator=(const String orig) const;
00130 
00131     const String& operator+=(const String rhs) const;
00132 
00133     operator const char *() const;
00134     operator std::string() const;
00135 
00136 //private:
00137     void fromAscii(const char* ascii) const;
00138     void fromUtf8(const char* unicode) const;
00139     struct Data {
00140         Data(size_t len) : data(len),refcount(1) {}
00141         virtual ~Data() {}
00142         Array<uchar> data;
00143         mutable std::size_t refcount;
00144     };
00145     mutable Data * strdata;
00146 
00147 };
00148 
00149 bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00150 inline bool operator==(const String lhs, const char* rhs) {
00151     return operator==(lhs,String(rhs));
00152 }
00153 inline bool operator==(const char* rhs, const String lhs) {
00154     return operator==(String(rhs),lhs);
00155 }
00156 bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00157 String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00158 //String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00159 String operator&(const String lhs, String(*rhs)(const String));
00160 String operator&(String(*lhs)(const String), const String rhs);
00161 String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);
00162 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const String rhs);
00163 
00164 String lc(const String rhs);
00165 String uc(const String rhs);
00166 String t(const String rhs);
00167 
00168 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00169 
00170 #endif /* STRING_H_ */
